Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Ate uha malaka hai dovam puraba (carhadi'am) ate dovam pachama (lahidi'am) da
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
Usa ne barabara mila ke calana vale do dari'a (samudara) paida kite
dovam de vica ika parada (roka) hai, jisa tom uha age nahim vadhade
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karonge
Inham dovam (samudaram) vicom moti ate muge nikalade hana
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
Ate jahaza vi use de hana jihare samudara vica paharam vanga kharhe hude hana
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
Jihara dharati'te hai uha nasa hona vala hai
Ate tere raba di hi prasasa vali ate izata vali hasati ka'ima rahegi
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karonge
Use tom magade hana jihare (makhaluka) akasam ate dharati vica hana. Hara roza usa da ika kama
(hai. 30) Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
He do bhari kafali'o! Asim jaladi hi tuhade vala dhi'ana karana vale ham
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
He jinam ate manukham de toli'o! Jekara tuhade tom ho sake tam tusim akasam ate dharati di'am hadam tom nikala ja'u. Tam nikala ja'u tusim' pramana tom binham nahim nikala sakade
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
Tuhade te aga di'am lapatam ate dhu'am chadi'a javega tam tusim baca nahim kara sakauge
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
Phira jadom akasa phata ke camare di' tar'ham lala ho javega
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
So usa dina kise manukha jam jina tom usa de papam bare paratala nahim hovegi
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karoge
